column2: Settlement of Cycles 4 and 5 of CAS, CEFTS and CPS (on 30.04.2021) will take place at 0830 hrs. on the next business

Participants are advised to monitor their settlement accounts through browser workstations and ensure sufficient funds are
available in the settlement accounts at the time of settlement of Multilateral Net Settlement (MLNS) batches in the RTGS
